Name: University of Tehran Question Dataset 2016 (UTQD.2016)
Abstract: Persian questions gathered from a jeopardy game broadcasted on Iranian national television.
RelevantInfo: The format of each record: Coarse-grained:Fine-grained|Question
Source:
Mohammad Razzaghnoori/Dept. of Mathematics, Statistics and Computer Science, College of Science, University of Tehran/m.razzaghnoori@ut.ac.ir
Hedieh Sajedi/ Dept. of Mathematics, Statistics and Computer Science, College of Science, University of Tehran/hhsajedi@ut.ac.ir
Iman Khani Jazani/Dept. of Computer Engineering and Information Technology, AmirKabirUniversity of Technology/imankhanijazani@aut.ac.ir
Acknowledgements:
Use of this dataset in publications must be acknowledged by referencing the following publication: 

Razzaghnoori, M., Sajedi, H., & Khani Jazani, I. (In Press). Question classification in Persian using word vectors and frequencies. Cognitive Systems Research. doi: 10.1016/j.cogsys.2017.07.002
RelevantPapers: M. Razzaghnoori, H. Sajedi, I Khani Jazani: 'Question classification in Persian using word vectors and frequencies', Cognitive Systems Research, 2018.
